content: GX 3-ME Gas-actuated fastening tool Gas nailer with single power source for electrical and mechanical applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features No battery – so no power source needed and no downtime due to charging Curved, 40-nail magazine for better accessibility in narrow spaces and deep tracks High fastening rate for high productivity and maximum efficiency Wide range of nails for fastening to a wide variety of materials Gas gauge helps to avoid running out of gas unexpectedly Applications Fastening cables and conduits to floors, walls and ceilings on concrete, solid masonry or steel Fastening various light electrical installations to floors, walls and ceilings on concrete, solid masonry or steel Fastening heating pipes to floors on concrete Suitable for various light-duty fastening applications on concrete, solid masonry or steel Fastening drywall track to floors, walls and ceilings on concrete, solid masonry or steel – use of the IF nailer nose is recommended ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimension (L x W): 436 x 5.2 mm Tool body weight: 8.8 lb.
